sentences.en: After tumor resection , myxoma with internal hemorrhage was proved by pathology.
sentences.cn: 病理报告证实, 此一肿瘤为罕见囊性黏液瘤.

sentences.en: Objective To analyse the clinical characteristics of the patients with embolic cerebrovascular disease caused by cardiac myxoma.
sentences.cn: 目的分析心脏粘液瘤致栓塞性脑血管病患者的临床特点。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the Electron Beam CT ( EBCT ) features of atrial myxoma and their diagnostic value.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨心房粘液瘤的电子束CT ( EBCT ) 征象和诊断价值.

sentences.en: Objective To review the experience in the diagnosis and surgical treatment of cardiac myxoma.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的探讨心脏黏液瘤的诊断和外科治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To study the clinical, diagnostic features and surgical therapy of left atrial myxoma.
sentences.cn: 目的总结左房粘液瘤的临床表现 、 诊断手段及外科手术治疗时机的把握.

sentences.en: Objective: To evaluate the implication of coronary arteriography in diagnosis of left atrial myxoma (LAM).
sentences.cn: 目的：评价冠状动脉（冠脉）造影对左房粘液瘤（LAM）诊断的意义。

words.tran_cn: 多发粘液瘤病；[肿瘤] 粘液瘤变性

trans.tran_en: a tumour composed of mucous connective tissue, usually situated in subcutaneous tissue
